DOC.brief_summary: Subjects enrol Professional Fighters Brain Health Study ( PFBHS ) receive 18F-AV-1451 explore use biomarker brain injury relate repetitive head trauma examine relationship clinical presentation tau deposition .
DOC.criteria: All Subjects Currently enrol PFBHS protocol participate minimum 10 professional fight Can tolerate Positron Emission Tomography ( PET ) scan procedure Have ability provide inform consent Subjects cognitive impairment Have subjective cognitive complaint objective decline impairment determine investigator Have behavior dysfunction likely interfere image Are claustrophobic otherwise unable tolerate imaging procedure Have current clinically significant cardiovascular disease clinically significant abnormality screen electrocardiogram A history additional risk factor Torsades de Pointes ( TdP ) take drug know cause QTprolongation Have current clinically significant infectious disease , endocrine metabolic disease , pulmonary , renal hepatic impairment , cancer Have nonstudy relate radiopharmaceutical imaging treatment procedure within 7 day prior study image session Have current drug alcohol dependence alcohol dependence within past 2 year
